manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do you need an amazing toy to develop the logical thinking of your kids? Let your kids boy and girl not only enjoy the game but also unleash their potential with this Logical Road Builder Game Toy! What is a Logical Road Builder Game? These are puzzles that challenge you to connect the path from start to goal using different track pieces, but the excitement doesn't stop there! Once you've solved the puzzles, to use the pull-back car, wind it up, place the car at the starting point and secure it in place. Next, it's time to put the ball on the pull-back car, and then give it a gentle push to start it off, and watch it race towards the finish line. Whether you choose to sit back and watch the action unfold or get in on the fun by cheering the car on, the pull-back car is sure to add a whole new level of excitement to this already engaging activity.

Educational Toys for 3+ Year old The puzzle is the classic logic game and one of the all-time most popular STEM toys and gifts for kids and adults alike. Contains 120 challenges from beginner to expert. You can refer to the questions and answers in the instruction to increase the level from simple to difficult.The 120 question cards are printed in the instruction manual Brain Teasers Games Build Skills Nurture your child's mind and have a blast at the same time with our logical road builder cause and effect toys! Watch your child's concentration skills, problem-solving abilities, spatial awareness, logic, programming, and planning soar while they play. Best Gift for Your Kids These toys are not only educational, but also incredibly entertaining! Your little ones will have so much fun with them, they won't even realize they're learning. Perfect for 3-year-old boys and girls, give the gift of endless play and learning with these top-notch toys!

How to Use the Pull-Back Car? Wind up the spring by pulling it back on a flat surface Hold onto the brake on the rear wheel to store the power Place the car at the starting point and secure it in place

Introducing The Logical Road Builder Preschool Learning Toys By BONITOTO! Discover the perfect way to bond with your child while enhancing their learning and development with our amazing Logical Road Builder Game! Co-designed by child development experts and qualified engineers, this game offers endless hours of building fun and the opportunity to develop crucial skills such as creativity, critical thinking, hand-eye coordination, and cooperative play. You and your little one can have a blast with this stunning preschool game while watching them grow and learn. Don't miss out on this opportunity to create cherished memories with your child and help them reach their full potential. Order now and experience the joy of learning through play!

What Are You Waiting For? Help Your Child Learn Through Playing! The ultimate building block toy that your kids will absolutely adore! Watch their creativity and imagination soar with hours of endless building fun. And that's not all – our Montessori STEM toys are expertly designed to enhance your child's learning and development, making them the perfect gift for any child. Moreover, we're so confident that you'll fall in love with our toys that we offer a satisfaction pledge. Don't wait, order now, and give your child the gift of boundless learning and fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Kid Game Ever
reviews.reviewText: I am a teacher and mom and I love this game for my own kids and may buy it for inside Recess! It is fun, involves problem solving and even though there is an extensive instruction manual with different tile combinations it can be very open ended as well! My 5 year old loves it, and this will be my go to gift for kids around this age for a while! It is something that at least initially parents should sit down with kids to explain how it works, but I would say after 3 days of playing he could probably independently play with this! Seriously cannot say enough good things about it!(Also they give 3 balls which is nice because I'm sure inevitably one will go missing)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of Fun!! But be prepared, the car won't always make it around the longer track "plans"
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We ordered this for my 6 year old for Christmas and honestly do not regret it at all! We spent HOURS playing with this. Not only following the suggested track options but he wanted to get creative and come up with ideas to create his own tracks as well. So I do LOVE this challenges his mind and keeps him off of electronics! However, even after carefully following instructions, we found that car will not always make it through the long track "plans/ideas" that book has suggested (video included). I have videos of other tracks where the car did succeed, however it will only allow me to upload one video. I included a photo showing that the 6 piece flat "track" can also be made into a 4 piece set which is sold as a separate kit, so if you are torn on which one to purchase, know that the bigger kit CAN be made smaller (and also includes more pieces for more options). We found we had the most success of the car making it through the track, if we started with marble already on the car. I helped my 6 year figure out his ideas by showing him to trace along the lines on the insert pieces to see if his planned track would work or "dead end". All in all, it was a lot of and good quality time together. It is definitely something that he is not ready to do solo at this point, but I feel it is good to help him problem solve and would recommend this product. But I will reiterate, that the car doesn't always make it through each course.We also went ahead and purchased an additional car, Incase his broke. But as of day two, the new car is still in the closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I didn't know if this would be too hard for my 4 year old granddaughter. She loved it and worked on it for a long time. Her 3 year old brother also could move the truck onto the track to participate. It was so much fun we bought this for another granddaughter (7 years old). She loved it too! It can we an easy path or can make it more challenging. We all had so much fun with this toy. HIGHLY RECOMMEND. If you have a small child that puts things in his/her mouth...be careful. Balls are tiny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great toy because it does not require batteries & keeps the child’s interest as well as challenges them. My grandson is 3 & he wanted to see how it made a heart for the vehicle to ride on. Great for the whole family to engage in together. It would be nice if there a pouch to keep the balls in & his grandfather had difficulty determining the directions. Overall we are satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great STEM toy
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is so interested in STEM toys and this makes a perfect addition to her toys. She learns while playing. It’s so much fun! My husband and I enjoy playing this with her too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Creative and well thought out!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this STEM game for my 5-year-old grandson, but his 9-year-old brother got just as much enjoyment out if it! It's not as straightforward as you might imagine and allows kids to map out strategies to get the marble/dumptruck to where they want it to end up. The game is well made and sturdy. Hopefully the grandkids won't lose the 3 supplied marbles too soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO Fun! The adults end up playing with it too.
reviews.reviewText: This has quickly become a favorite toy.Easy to put together.The little tractor zooms around the track that the kids design and it dumps little marbles into the final puzzle piece if you make successfully to the end.It also teaches a kid how to problem solve and have fun at the same time.The Parents end up playing with it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These were gifts and they were happy with them. I don’t know if it was what they wanted but that’s what they got🤗
